`$=customJS.dv_funcs.mentionedIn(dv)`

In the [[Ayurveda|Ayurvedic]] tradition, Brahmi is a cognitive enhancer herb used for [[anxiety]] and [[insomnia]]. 
 ^[[[course_Dr. K's Guide to Mental Health]]]
